name: Planning Poker Guest App
description: This app allows guests (players without a Salesforce License) to participate in the Planning Poker game that is run using Salesforce.

SF_CONSUMER_KEY.description: Consumer Key of the Salesforce Connected App

SF_USERNAME.description: Username of the integration user who has been assigned the Planning Poker Player permission set

SF_NAMESPACE.description: Namespace of the Planning Poker Host App package. Leave the default value if you have installed the host app using the official package from the Readme file

PRIVATE_KEY.description: Contents of the private.pem file generated from the certificate creation step
